com.nhn.android.maps

Class NMapLocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapLocationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener

    public class NMapLocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener
    Location manager which implements LocationListener. You will want to call enableMyLocation(), probably from your Activity's Activity.onResume() method, to enable the features of this overlay. Remember to call the corresponding disableMyLocation() in your Activity's Activity.onPause() method to turn off updates when in the background. Note. NMapView requires following permissions in the manifest file of your application. - android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION - android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

        See Also:
        http://developer.android.com/google/play-services/location.html

      • setUpdateFrequency

        public void setUpdateFrequency(long minTime,
                               float minDistance)
        Set the frequency of location updates. If minTime is greater than 0, the LocationManager could potentially rest for minTime milliseconds between location updates to conserve power. If minDistance is greater than 0, a location will only be broadcasted if the device moves by minDistance meters. To obtain notifications as frequently as possible, set both parameters to 0.
        Parameters:
        minTime - the minimum time interval for location updates, in milliseconds.
        minDistance - the minimum distance interval for location updates, in meters.

      • setStartTimeout

        public void setStartTimeout(long timeout)
        Set timeout to wait more accurate location after enableMyLocation().
        Parameters:
        timeout - start timeout value in milliseconds, default is 2000.

      • setStartAccuracy

        public void setStartAccuracy(float accuracy)
        Set accuracy to wait more accurate location after enableMyLocation().
        Parameters:
        accuracy - start accuracy value in meters, default is 50.

      • hasLocationProvider

      • enableMyLocation

        public boolean enableMyLocation(boolean skipLastLocation)
        Attempts to enable MyLocation, registering for updates from GRP and Network.
        Parameters:
        skipLastLocation - set true to skip last known location data, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        true if we found at least one provider to enable. False if every one we tried was unavailable.

      • disableMyLocation

        public void disableMyLocation()
        Stops location updates.
